meanings.definition: Failure to appear or be present.
meanings.sent1: Her nonappearances at the meetings caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: The nonappearances of the stars on a cloudy night make it hard to stargaze.
meanings.sent3: The nonappearances of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The nonappearances of the sun during the storm made the day feel gloomy.
meanings.sent5: The nonappearances of the main character in the play added mystery to the storyline.

meanings.definition: The state of not being visible or noticeable.
meanings.sent1: The nonappearances of the ghostly figure in the dark room scared the children.
meanings.sent2: In the dense fog, the nonappearances of landmarks made navigation difficult.
meanings.sent3: The nonappearances of the missing puzzle piece delayed completing the picture.
meanings.sent4: The nonappearances of the shy student in class made it hard for the teacher to notice them.
meanings.sent5: The nonappearances of the rare bird species in the forest puzzled the birdwatchers.
